Question.Subject: Update Vista to 7? IE 8 vs. Chrome or some other browser?
Question.Content: I get enough "Internet Explorer cannot display the page" screens to choke a horse. Is this just the fault of IE, or would Windows 7 improve my performance? I'm a total computer feeb, so please help!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Chrome or SRWare Iron are my browser choices, but you might do what I did for a solution, find a DNS Server close to your location like, OpenDNS, Google DNS Public Servers, DNS Advantage, etc. One will usually be a bit faster than the others depending on location to your ISP...

Answer.Content: Chrome or SRWare Iron are my browser choices, but you might do what I did for a solution, find a DNS Server close to your location like, OpenDNS, Google DNS Public Servers, DNS Advantage, etc. One will usually be a bit faster than the others depending on location to your ISP...
